text:
【5】革細工・カービング・刺繍体験など、ものづくりのためのラウンジ「クラフトルーム」を完備
【6】ホテル敷地内に「テニスコート」「ゴルフ場」「キッズアスレチック」が点在
【7】熱海から車で60分・箱根から車で90分の好立地
【お食事】
朝食付き
【支払い方法】
trans:
[5] Equipped with a lounge, "Craft Room," for creative experiences such as leatherworking / carving / embroidery.
[6] Within the hotel grounds, "Tennis Court," "Golf Course," and "Kids' Athletic Area" are available.
[7] Conveniently located 60 minutes by car from Atami / 90 minutes by car from Hakone.
[Meals]
Breakfast included
[Payment Method]
